p: Given the already weak economy of some countries and the resultant draw back risks precipitated by the COVID-19 pandemic, the near-term challenges would warrant reinforcing some policy actions to contain the untold challenges of COVID-19. There is a need to strengthen health care systems, boost investor confidence and demand, and limit adverse economic effects. There is need for multilateral policy dialogue to curtail and foster agreements on acceptable containment. Policy measures are needed to cushion the economic impact of the coronavirus regarding inflation of essential commodities and services.
